username.description: Ingame player name. Important: ensure unicity
Ingame player name. Important: ensure unicity

hashedRefreshToken.description: The JWT refresh token string as hash

filter.title: Filters that applied to the query

username.description: Ingame player name. Important: ensure unicity

crypted_password.description: Unique nounce to sign for authentication

version.description: Version string of the Map to handle multiple versions of Maps during games, note: no dots in this string please

initialTerritoryStates.description: Initial States of all Territories of the Map

strategicStates.description: List of Strategic states for this Map

hqs.description: List of HQ for this Map. Attached to the Users by order in the list       corresponding to WgModel objects

routes.description: List of Map routes. This field is an oriented graph

ownerIndex.description: Player index of owner of the territory, points to constant if neutral, actually defaults to -1

mines.description: List of all mines and their population

infraStates.description: Map of all infraStates by slotID

consAmount.description: Map of constructions amount by ConstructionType

troopStates.description: Troop state of the territory by playerIndex

startingHq.description: The label of the starting HQ of this player

lockedPhase.description: Has the player locked his phase

mutedPlayerIndexes.description: Indexes of players this player has muted in this match

userIds.description: Participating user IDs. The order defines the player index.

usernames.description: Participating usernames. Should sync with userIds.

planetName.description: Name of the Planet for this Wargame

perIndexWinConditions.description: List of per playerIndex win conditions

perIndexLoseConditions.description: List of per playerIndex lose conditions

territoryStates.description: Fixed Territory states of the phase by label

playerStates.description: Player states of the phase. Contains all the high level player data in the WG.         The key is the player ID

lockedPlayersAmount.description: Number of locked players in the wg

activePlayersAmount.description: Number of active players in the wg

phase.description: Phase number key for this order

cancelable.description: Can the user cancel the order ?

startPhase.description: Phase where the order was created

resolutionPhase.description: Phase where the order will be resolved and closed

reportSteps.description: Indicate the current report over the order status

ConstructionType.description: Build Construction Type ( AAB, FARMS, BUNKERS )

backendVersion.description: Backend version number used to write this archive
